law.catch_line: Civil penalties for violation of chapter.
law.text: Any person who violates any of the provisions of this chapter shall be subject to the uniform civil penalties imposed pursuant to KRS 131.180.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 21, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 62, Pt. II, sec. 7.
